title: 208 - The Smooth Crèmeu
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a FULL BARN! The boys all catch up on their CRAZY Wrestlmania weekend and then jump right into the Pod FOD. The Pod FOD is a folder compiled of all things from the internet. Todays FOD includes the real story behind “Shrek”, some great show talk including a preview of Sherlock Holmes HBO spin off series, live reaction of a 400 year old monk stealing children’s souls, and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
